title: Crush
overview: San Wu Yan, who is about to graduate from college, dreams of becoming a TV presenter, works as a radio assistant and she likes a mysterious songwriter under the pseudonym Yi Jin. The girl at first sight falls in love with Su Nian Qin, whom she accidentally meets, and later learns that he is visually impaired. Layer by layer, San Wu Yan removes the elusive, arrogant and indifferent shell from Su Nian Qin, the cause of which is his broken family, until it turns out that he is the most talented Yi Jin. Their communication leads to a whirlwind romance, but the couple breaks up due to pressure and misunderstanding of reality. Three years later, two people who were walking different paths meet again...Â
